images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual for the email campaign, capturing the essence of Thailand's beaches and cultural landmarks during autumn, appealing to families looking for a relaxing getaway.
AI-selected These destination images will showcase key cultural sites in Thailand, such as the Royal Palace and local markets, emphasizing the adventurous and cultural aspects of the trip.
AI-selected These destination images will showcase key cultural sites in Thailand, such as the Royal Palace and local markets, emphasizing the adventurous and cultural aspects of the trip.
AI-selected Promotional icons will highlight special offers and deals related to the campaign, encouraging engagement and bookings.
AI-selected Promotional icons will highlight special offers and deals related to the campaign, encouraging engagement and bookings.
AI-selected Promotional icons will highlight special offers and deals related to the campaign, encouraging engagement and bookings.
AI-selected The logo will be placed in the header of the email, reinforcing brand identity and trustworthiness for potential travelers.
AI-selected Decorative illustrations will enhance the overall aesthetic of the email, creating an inviting atmosphere that aligns with the campaign's exotic and relaxing tone.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn
assetRequirements.content_context: A scenic view of a beach in Thailand showcasing clear skies, warm weather, and cultural landmarks.

assetRequirements.purpose: visual representation of cultural sites and activities in Thailand
assetRequirements.content_context: Images of the Royal Palace, local markets, and traditional festivals.

assetRequirements.purpose: to highlight the autumn season in Thailand
assetRequirements.content_context: Visuals of autumn foliage and warm beach settings.

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Тайланд ждет вас!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual for the email campaign, capturing the essence of Thailand's beaches and cultural landmarks during autumn, appealing to families looking for a relaxing getaway.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
